ygData.msgSnippet: All right, I ve had enough of this. I m tired of people taking shots at others when they know they ll get a reaction. What s more, they take it at Kyle, and

All right, I've had enough of this.

I'm tired of people taking shots at others when they know they'll get 
a reaction. What's more, they take it at Kyle, and that means you've 
got about a week's worth of oocs coming after. Mark my words: NO ONE 
IS MORE STUPID THAN ANYONE ELSE HERE.
Another thing: personnal beliefs. I don't care about the religious or 
sexual orientation. For all I know, ANYONE in this rpg could be gay 
and that WOULD CHANGE NOTHING. You're not a better person because 
you're gay or not or christian or not. That means nothing.
We have an expression in Quebec that can be translated as "Farting 
higher than where the hole is". It means taking yourself for someone 
you are not. I don't want that here. I'm not asking everyone to be 
friend with everyone, just to be respectful of them.

I just want people to realize that being mean for nothing gives 
nothing. That's the kind of attitude that gets the war going in Israel 
and palestine. And I assure, I will personnally moderate anyone who 
intentionnally insults someone for an undetermined period of time.
